name: Kheppy's Delivery Service
description:
Deep Lore

A happy beetle named Kheppy has to deliver fertilizer to all of the flowers in your garden :)

Objective

COLLECT fertilizer and DELIVER to grow flowers!

Controls

Arrow keys OR gamepad left stick

Gamepad input may be bugged in HTML5 version. Please download the desktop version to play on gamepad.

Made by Peter Sheehan, Felipe Vega and Carter Williams.
